borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: <div><span style="font-size: 11pt;">The&nbsp;proposed development by reason of its sitting would result in an increased sense of overbearingness and a harmful loss daylight to neighbouring occupiers,</span>&nbsp;therefore constituting unneighbourly development and contrary to:<br></div><div><br></div><div>- National Planning Policy Framework (MHCLG, February 2019);</div><div>-<span style="font-size: 11pt;">Policy D4 of the&nbsp;London Plan (March 2021);</span></div><div>-Polic<span style="font-size: 11pt;">y DMD 1 and DMD 6 of the Draft Local Plan&nbsp;</span><span style="font-size: 11pt;">(Regulation 19 Consultation&nbsp;Version, October 2020);</span></div><div>- Policy CP3 of the LDF Core Strategy (July 2010);</div><div>- Policies BP8 and BP11 of the LDF Borough Wide Development Plan Policies DPD (March 2011);</div><div>- The Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012).</div>

<div><span style="font-size: 11pt;">The proposed development by reason of irregular design results in a bulky and discordant addition to&nbsp;the original dwellinghouse. Furthermore, the proposed development results in a loss of a characteristic&nbsp;openess within the street scene</span>.&nbsp; Therefore, the proposed development are considered harmful to the appearance of the house and character of the area. As such, the proposed development is contrary to:<br></div><div><br></div><div>- National Planning Policy Framework (MHCLG, February 2019);</div><div><div><span style="font-size:11pt">- Policy D4 of the&nbsp;London Plan (March 2021);</span></div></div><div>-&nbsp;<span style="font-size: 11pt;">Policies&nbsp;SP 2, DMD 1 and&nbsp;DMD 6&nbsp;of&nbsp;the Draft Local Plan&nbsp;</span><span style="font-size: 11pt;">(Regulation 19 Consultation&nbsp;Version, October 2020);&nbsp;</span></div><div>- Policy CP3 of the LDF Core Strategy (July 2010);</div><div>- Policies BP8 and BP11 of the LDF Borough Wide Development Plan Policies DPD (March 2011);</div><div>- The Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012).</div>
description: Construction of a part two storey part single storey rear and side extension.
